short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fight Climate Change every time you open a new app!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Imagine fighting climate change without having to do anything. NuTab redirects your new tabs to a site with a beautiful picture of Earth... and a few ads. That ad revenue is invested directly in either reducing or removing emissions from the atmosphere with our partner, Bluski inc. 

NuTab also tracks how many tabs you helped open and how many trees-worth of emissions have been eliminated thanks to the efforts of users like you.
